text: 1.12: Dan 9.24; Ef 3.10; Hi 11.13; 11.39-40Mbe maaŋ nzuaim, Fhe Bakɨme khuen mbe khɨvigi, mba bigi nta nduarira wari won tuga sarav hegɨrga tuktɨgi fhuvara. Zakɨra fhuvara! Mbe Fhe Bakɨme taagi nde ndirga kameŋ bun nzuaim, nde ne mbarara. Ntigem, Fhe Bakɨme won Ŋina Ŋaara sarigim, ana Hevenan kegap zergim, ana ŋkasŋkar panan, gumgi ana buna vhuueŋ bun nzuav, mbe Fhe Bakɨme nden muun zav suaŋgi buneŋ, mbe ne bun suaŋgi. Fhe Bakɨme enseri, mbe vhɨra Fhe Bakɨme nden muun za mbui bigeŋ kaŋgirgane vuzvugi.
